markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Specific Magic Armor](/Rules.aspx?ID=3172)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 230 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
These suits of armor have abilities far different from what can be gained by etching runes. A specific magic armor lists its fundamental runes, which you can upgrade, add, or transfer as normal. You can’t etch or transfer any property runes onto a specific armor that it doesn’t already have or remove its property runes.

[Click here for the Specific Magic Armor category page](/Equipment.aspx?Category=11&Subcategory=14).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Specific Magic Armor
